docs.title: About Me
docs.text: Hi! I'm Yarin, a DevOps and cloud engineer specializing in AWS infrastructure and F5 technologies. With professional certifications in F5 BIG-IP and experience in cloud architecture, I focus on building robust, scalable infrastructure solutions.

docs.title: Professional Certifications
docs.text:
1. F5 LTM Certification
  2. Course: Configuring BIG-IP Local Traffic Manager
  3. Completed: September 19, 2024

  4. CPE Hours: 21

  5. F5 BIG-IP Certification

  6. Course: Administering BIG-IP
  7. Completed: September 16, 2024
  8. CPE Hours: 14
